name: MXSegmentedPager
summary: Segmented pager view with Parallax header.
description: MXSegmentedPager is a pager view using [HMSegmentedControl](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/HMSegmentedControl) as control. The integration of [VGParallaxHeader](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/VGParallaxHeader) allows you to add an parallax header on top while keeping a reliable scrolling effect.
